title: I Dunno About You, But Them Rioters...
body:
I've been tackling this game for a few years now, what with showing up around the Gragas/Shen release time...

And I have to admit one fact.  Some people might disagree with me on this but that's their right...but they're wrong.

Whoever made the login music is amazing at their job.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5r03Q3gglV8
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VQRqylWKaw4

I mean whether it be Vi or Ekko, Jinx or even Jhin whoever did the music deserves all the cookies.

replies.body: Music team is the one Riot team that never gets shat on by the community, seriously they're amazing. Praeco, Scherzophrenia, Chemicalseb, marignak, kyugene, ProtoShredanoid, Saiyaka, Wenceslaus, and EdTheConqueror currently make up the team, iirc.

> [{quoted}](name=nightsharks,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zOBBEk2p,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-02-29T19:06:02.073+0000)
>
> Music team is the one Riot team that never gets shat on by the community, seriously they're amazing. Praeco, Scherzophrenia, Chemicalseb, marignak, kyugene, ProtoShredanoid, Saiyaka, Wenceslaus, and EdTheConqueror currently make up the team, iirc.

Do you know if they ever put out an album including all the music, or something along those lines?

There was an album released early last year that has some of the music:
http://promo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/music-of-league/

And I believe most of the music is also on the League of Legends Soundcloud:
https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends

> [{quoted}](name=ArlanKels,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zOBBEk2p,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-02-29T13:20:17.002+0000)
>
> I've been tackling this game for a few years now, what with showing up around the Gragas/Shen release time...
> 
> And I have to admit one fact.  Some people might disagree with me on this but that's their right...but they're wrong.
> 
> Whoever made the login music is amazing at their job.
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5r03Q3gglV8
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VQRqylWKaw4
> 
> I mean whether it be Vi or Ekko, Jinx or even Jhin whoever did the music deserves all the cookies.

what about this? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ajX6oFoegU
They are profoundly sexy in what they do. No doubt.
Awesome music :D remember to thank Riot Gypsylord, he designed all the champions you mentioned.
Jinx's song "Get Jinxed" is a song I listen to at the gym.  It's a song you can enjoy without knowing what League of Legends even is.
That's all of Gypsylord's champions. Seriously that guy makes some top tier champs.
I have the Jhin,kindred, and Ekko logins on my iTunes and mmmmmm they're good
